statements: DELETE FROM patient_health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever' AND diagnosis_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM patient_health_records WHERE patient_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM patient_health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID-19%' AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM patient_medical_history WHERE patient_id = (SELECT patient_id FROM patient_personal_info WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM patient_symptoms WHERE patient_id = 6789 AND symptom_id = 123;
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 201 AND diagnosis = 'Fever';
